Administrative Divisions 








Main Content Region



Administrative Divisions


















Academic Affairs
Academic Affairs focuses on student success and faculty support at Cal State San Bernardino. It oversees the university’s five colleges along with various departments that include faculty affairs & development, academic research, academic resources, graduate studies, Academic Success and Undergraduate Advising.

Office of the Provost & Vice President of Academic Affairs
Faculty Affairs & Development
Academic Programs

Administration and Finance
The mission of the Division of Administration and Finance is to provide quality and effective fiscal, physical, and support services and to ensure a safe and congenial environment for the university community.

Division of Administration & Finance
Accounting Services
Accounts Payable
Auxiliary Financial Services
Budget Office
Environmental Health & Safety
Facilities Planning & Management
Finance & Administrative Services
Parking & Transportation Services
Police
Printing Services
Procurement and Contracts (Purchasing)
Property Management
Receiving & Mail Services
Support Services
Risk Management
Student Financial Services
Travel
University Enterprises Corporation at CSUSB















Human Resources
The Human Resources Department provides service in the areas of benefits, compensation, employee and labor relations, employment, payroll, performance management, recognition, training and development, leaves of absence and other HR programs. Whether you are a job seeker, current or new employee, retiree or simply a visitor, HR will provide answers to many of your questions.

Division of Human Resources, Office of the Vice President
Division of Human Resources, Office of the Executive Director
Benefits
Classifications & Compensation
Diversity & Inclusion
Employee & Labor Relations
Institutional Equity & Compliance
Staff Development Center
Payroll Services
Student Employment
Talent Acquisition















Information Technology Services
Our mission is to support student, faculty and staff success by providing world class customer service, fostering faculty-led innovation and research, and enhancing operational efficiency through the effective use of information technologies.

Division of Information Technology Services
Academic Technologies & Innovation
Administrative Computing & User Experience
Digital Transformation
Indentity, Security, & Enterprise Technologies
Institutional Research & Analytics
Technology Operations & Customer Support
Technology Support Center
Telecommunications & Network Services
Strategic Technology Initiatives
